## Create the matrics

```{r}
A <- matrix(1:100, nrow = 10)
B <- matrix(1:1000, nrow = 10)
```


## Inspect Dimensions

```{r}
dim(A)
```

```{r}
dim(B)
```

## Compute Inverse and Determinant

```{r}
# For A
invA <- solve(A)
detA <- det(A)

# For B, use tryCatch to capture errors
invB <- tryCatch(solve(B), error = function(e) e)
detB <- tryCatch(det(B),   error = function(e) e)
```
